description.value:
This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers.

Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.
description.chat: This set of tools includes a small file, a set of lock picks, a small mirror mounted on a metal handle, a set of narrow-bladed scissors, and a pair of pliers. Proficiency with these tools lets you add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to disarm traps or open locks.

data.chatFlavor: Attempt to use Thieves' Tools in some creative or nefarious manner...

magicitems.destroyFlavorText: reaches 0 charges: it crumbles into ashes and is destroyed.
